quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
author: Unknown

quote: Personal growth is not a matter of learning new information but of unlearning old limits.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don't belong.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: The only way that we can live, is if we grow. The only way that we can grow is if we change.

quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: Investing in yourself is the best investment you will ever make.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: You'll never be able to grow if you're afraid to lose people during the process.

quote: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.

quote: Growth is never by mere chance; it's the result of forces working together.

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

quote: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.

quote: Don't go through life, grow through life.

quote: The growth and development of people is the highest calling of leadership.

quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.

quote: Growth itself contains the germ of happiness.

quote: We find comfort among those who agree with us - growth among those who don't.

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.

quote: Growth is an erratic forward movement: two steps forward, one step back. Remember that and be very gentle with yourself.

quote: The mind, once stretched by a new idea, never returns to its original dimensions.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Growth is the great separator between those who succeed and those who do not. When I see a person beginning to separate themselves from the pack, it's almost always due to personal growth.

quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The greatest gift you can give somebody is your own personal development. I used to say, 'If you will take care of me, I will take care of you.' Now I say, 'I will take care of me for you if you will take care of you for me.'

quote: The growth of understanding follows an ascending spiral rather than a straight line.

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.

quote: The swiftest way to triple your success is to double your investment in personal development.

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.

quote: The important thing is this: to be able at any moment to sacrifice what we are for what we could become.

quote: People wish to be settled; only as far as they are unsettled is there any hope for them.

quote: We grow small trying to be great.

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

quote: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But, nothing is as painful as staying stuck where you do not belong.
author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.

quote: The future belongs to those who learn more skills and combine them in creative ways.

quote: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.

quote: Personal development is the belief that you are worth the effort, time, and energy needed to develop yourself.

quote: To earn more, you must learn more.

quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.

quote: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.

quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: There is no challenge more challenging than the challenge to improve yourself.

quote: You are essentially who you create yourself to be, and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.

quote: If you want to be successful, it's just this simple. Know what you are doing. Love what you are doing. And believe in what you are doing.
